trigger: Cell death was measured by vital dye exclusion test by staining cells with 5 mug / ml propidium iodide ( [ PI ] ; Calbiochem Corp . ; La Jolla , CA ; 5 mg / ml ) for one minute on ice .
Cell death was measured by vital dye exclusion test by staining cells with 5 mug / ml propidium iodide ( [ PI ] ; Calbiochem Corp . ; La Jolla , CA ; 5 mg / ml ) for one minute on ice .
At least 1 , 000 cells per sample were run on a BD FACSCalibur flow cytometer .
